description: Divide odd numbers into groups with prime(n) elements and add together.
links: Hieronymus Fischer, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: Contribution from _Hieronymus Fischer_, Sep 26 2012 (Start):a(n) = sum_{k=(A007504(n-1)+1).. A007504(n)} (2*k-1), n>1a(n) = A007504(n)^2 - A007504(n-1)^2, n>1.If we define A007504(0) := 0, then the formulas above are also true for n=1.a(n) = 2*A034957(n) + A000040(n).a(n) = 2*A034956(n) - A000040(n).a(n) = A034959(n) + A000040(n).(End)
maple: S:= n-> sum(ithprime(k), k=1..n): seq(S(n+1)^2-S(n)^2, n=1..40). [From Gary Detlefs, Dec 20 2011]
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Oct 15 1998.
